employees.notes: Proff lists the company headcount as "Ansatte 39" on the profile page; no explicit reporting year is shown for that headcount figure.[1]

revenue.notes: Proff reports "Sum driftsinntekter 2024 257 814" and states "Beløp i 1000", so the value is interpreted as NOK thousands (257,814,000 NOK).[1]

company.entity_resolution_notes: Entity matched to Norwegian legal company BMO TUNNELSIKRING AS with org number 995288621 in Proff official company data.[1] Company website uses the same company name and confirms Norwegian operations from Arnatveit.[2]

srm_assessment.overall_summary: Reviewed public company descriptions focus on tunnel rehabilitation services, machinery, and construction activities, but provide no concrete evidence of recycled/recovered/waste-derived materials used as inbound inputs.[2][3]
gaps_and_uncertainties: No public quantitative disclosures were found for inbound SRM input factors (materials, feedstocks, or SRM energy) for this legal entity in the reviewed sources.[1][2][3]
Available pages describe service scope and equipment, but do not disclose recycled-content procurement or waste-derived input use.[2][3]

evidence.evidence_snippet: Juridisk navn BMO TUNNELSIKRING AS Org nr 995 288 621
evidence.claim: Legal name and organization number of the entity.

evidence.evidence_snippet: 42.990 Bygging av andre anlegg ikke nevnt annet sted

evidence.claim: Reported employee count on company profile.
Revenue figures are presented in thousands NOK.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Dette omfatter grunnarbeid, bergsikring, vann- og frostsikring og elektroarbeider
evidence.claim: Company activity description focuses on tunnel works.
Published equipment list includes PE-foam bolting rig.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Som entreprenør utfører vi alt fra grunnarbeider, bergsikring, vann og frostsikring og elektroarbeider i tunnelene.
evidence.claim: Company describes construction work scope rather than SRM inputs.

sources.title: BMO Tunnelsikring AS - Org.nr. 995 288 621 - Arnatveit - Se Regnskap, Roller og mer
